byline.contributor: Somini Sengupta contributed reporting from New York.

abstract: America's United Nations ambassador Samantha Power says Pres Obama's 2016 agenda includes hosting summit meeting on global migrant crisis and pushing governments and corporations for more humanitarian aid; leaves open question of how many Syrian refugees United States would commit to accepting.
lead_paragraph: The president also plans to spend his final year in office working to spur other countries and the private sector to contribute more humanitarian aid, his United Nations ambassador said Monday.

headline.main: Obama Plans Summit on Migrant Crisis
headline.print_headline: Obama Plans Summit on Migrant Crisis

snippet: The president also plans to spend his final year in office working to spur other countries and the private sector to contribute more humanitarian aid, his United Nations ambassador said Monday.
